about_the_game:
Multiplayer

Multiplayer Diecast Shop Simulator lets you manage a diecast model store. Organize shelves, assist customers, and expand your shop in a detailed, realistic world. Join our Discord to connect with other players and share your diecast shop experiences!

Build Your Diecast Shop

Create the ultimate diecast empire from the ground up. Design, manage, and grow your dream diecast shop in a bustling city where your creativity and strategy will lead to success.

Manager

Arrange diecast models on shelves, optimize store layout for aesthetics and efficiency, and create an inviting shopping experience.

Customization

Customize and decorate every corner of your store to create a charming and personalized shopping environment.

Unlock New Licenses

Buy licenses from top brands to stock a wide range of diecast models. Add variety to your shop and attract more customers with every new brand you bring in.

Find Rare Items

Hunt for rare and chase cars to add to your collection. Attract diecast enthusiasts and collectors by offering exclusive items.

Trade with Customers

Engage with customers to trade diecast models. Build relationships and create a loyal customer base through fair and exciting trades.

Grow

Expand your store’s physical space, upgrade interiors, and continually adapt to meet customer demands.

Online Orders

Process and deliver online orders with a scooter, ensuring timely and accurate delivery.

Features

  • Diecast Trading System

  • Cleaning Mechanic

  • NPC Interactions

  • Random Events

  • Advertisement System

  • Banking & Credit Systems

  • Security Cameras & Shoplifters

  • Warehouse & Inventory Management

  • Vibrant & Interactive City

Dive into Diecast Shop Simulator and build your dream diecast store from the ground up!

name: Diecast Shop Simulator
short_description: Multiplayer Diecast Shop Simulator lets you manage a diecast model store. Organize shelves, assist customers, and expand your shop in a detailed, realistic world. Hunt for rare and chase cars, trade with customers, and grow your diecast empire.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Finnish, Greek, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese
